= Game for Warm Beach Camp =
 I built this large scale outdoor game using GWT for the game logic and DMX to control the lighting. Here's some of the story.
 * [http://gonevertical.org/LightsForChristmas/ Latest Demo] - Here is the latest.
 * [http://lightsforchristmas.appspot.com/ Demo Earlier Game Version] - I built a GAE version, this version still has some UI errors, I had to split b/c of the dmx drivers.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn/trunk/LightsForChristmas/src/org/gonevertical/loc/client Source] - latest source form the Ubuntu computer that runs at the camp.

== Why ==
 I wanted to donate some fun to Warm Beach Camp [http://warmbeach.com/index.php/lights-of-christmas WarmBeach.com] and in the process learn more.

== Library Reference ==
 * [http://rxtx.org/ rxtx] - Used for dmx communication
 * [http://www.enttec.com/index.php?main_menu=Products&prod=70304&show=links Entec Usb] - Controller to talk dmx
 * I built it to run only on Ubuntu b/c its so fast to setup and use

== Java DMX Control ==
 512 DMX universe control using Java, RXTX.org lib on Ubuntu. 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn/trunk/LightsForChristmas/dmx/org/gonevertical/loc/server/dmx Java DMX Source] - See the classes that control the lights
